function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective pandemic responses at the local government level","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, ineffective mitigation, preparedness, response, and recovery","Mitigation":"Developing clear local government level coordination plans, investing in strategic commitment to public health across sectors, and fostering institutional coordination across multiple agencies and jurisdictions","Technologies":"Administrative, technological, political, and biomedical skills","People":"Local government officials, public health leaders, and diverse communities","Owner":"Local government officials, public health leaders, and institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of institutional coordination across multiple agencies and different jurisdictions","Impact":"Ineffective pandemic responses, lack of clear lines of authority among agencies, and poor communication between health officials and the public","Mitigation":"Developing institutional coordination plans, establishing clear lines of authority among agencies, and fostering transparent communication between health officials and the public","Technologies":"Administrative, technological, and communication skills","People":"Institutional stakeholders, public health leaders, and diverse communities","Owner":"Institutional stakeholders and public health leaders"},{"Description":"Ethical issues related to communicating risks and responses","Impact":"Unethical practices in disease surveillance, failure to engage diverse communities, and disregard for diverse values, beliefs, and cultures","Mitigation":"Recognizing the ethical issues, engaging with diverse communities with timely information, and respecting diverse values, beliefs, and cultures","Technologies":"Communication and cultural competency skills","People":"Law enforcement, health officials, and diverse communities","Owner":"Law enforcement, health officials, and institutions"}]}
